Job Title: Technical Writer (Top Secret Clearance Required)

Location: Arlington, VA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Marketing, Public Relations, Writing/Editing

Description:
Title

Technical Writer (Top Secret Clearance Required)

KBR is hiring a Technical Writer. You will provide support to the Office of the Undersecretary of Defense for Research and Engineering (OUSD(R&E) Assistant Secretary of Defense for Mission Capabilities (ASD(MC)) and the Deputy Assistant Secretary of Defense for Prototypes & Experiments (DASD(P&E)) located in Arlington, VA (National Capital Region). The organization’s mission is to identify, develop, and demonstrate forward looking concepts encompassing multi-domain technologies to satisfy Multi-Service and Combatant Commands priorities for the Department of Defense.

Your essential job functions will include but may not be limited to:

Produce Integrated Assessment Plans for Rapid Defense Experimentation Reserve (RDER) projects. The Integrated Assessment Plans must capture the objectives, data collection requirements, test plans, test data, test results, and conclusions to produce and summarize the products/documents that clarify the prototype’s features, benefits, and limitations.Ensure that all necessary information has been included allowing readers to quickly understand the purpose, performance, and utility of the capability under review.

Qualifications

Minimum 10 years’ experience as a technical writer.Experience with classified programs.Must have technical familiarity with System Requirements, Key Performance Parameters (KPPs), Measures of Performance (MOPs), Measures of Effectiveness (MOEs), and minimum acceptable/desired system capabilities.Must be efficient in generating PowerPoint Briefs and Assessments.Must have operational analyst background.

Desired Qualifications

Must synthesize large volumes of information into concise, well-informed written products.Experience writing for an OSD audience is strongly preferred.Military or OSD experience.

Education Requirements

Bachelor’s degree in a relevant field.

Clearance Requirements

Active Top Secret (TS) with Sensitive Compartmented Information (SCI) eligibility.U.S. Citizenship is required for this position.

KBR is an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, disability, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, age, national origin, veteran status, genetic information, union status and/or beliefs, or any other characteristic protected by federal, state, or local law.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
